docs.snippet: The parent company of the social network Snapchat is valuing itself at up to $22 billion as it prepares for the tech industry's biggest initial public offering in years....
docs.lead_paragraph: The parent company of the social network Snapchat is valuing itself at up to $22 billion as it prepares for the tech industry's biggest initial public offering in years.

headline.main: Snap Values Itself at Up to $22B Ahead of IPO

docs.snippet: In the age of Snapchat and Instagram, Jonna Twigg sees books like the ones she sells as a place for words and images that are “private, intimate, intentional.”...

docs.snippet: As Snap Inc looks to gobble up a larger share of the $82 billion digital U.S. ad market, the owner of the ephemeral messaging app popular with millennials could find itself facing more demands from advertisers for reliable metrics....
docs.lead_paragraph: As Snap Inc looks to gobble up a larger share of the $82 billion digital U.S. ad market, the owner of the ephemeral messaging app popular with millennials could find itself facing more demands from advertisers for reliable metrics.

headline.main: Snap Advertisers Worry About Measurement Even as They 'Lean In'
headline.print_headline: Snap Advertisers Worry About Measurement Even as They 'Lean In'

docs.snippet: As shares of California-based Snap Inc began trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, two dozen residents of the company's adopted home of Venice Beach protested outside its offices, accusing the growing tech company of spoiling their s...
docs.lead_paragraph: As shares of California-based Snap Inc began trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, two dozen residents of the company's adopted home of Venice Beach protested outside its offices, accusing the growing tech company of spoiling their seaside community.

headline.main: Snap HQ Spoils Community, Venice Beach Protesters Say
headline.print_headline: Snap HQ Spoils Community, Venice Beach Protesters Say

docs.snippet: Comcast Corp’s NBCUniversal is pacing ahead in the amount of advertising inventory it has sold for next February’s Winter Olympics compared with the same time four years ago, NBC Sports executives said on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday rejected New Hampshire's bid to revive a state law barring voters from taking "selfie" photos with their ballots during elections that a lower court struck down as a violation of free speech rights....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday rejected New Hampshire's bid to revive a state law barring voters from taking "selfie" photos with their ballots during elections that a lower court struck down as a violation of free speech rights.

headline.main: U.S. Top Court Won't Revive New Hampshire Ballot 'Selfie' Ban
headline.print_headline: U.S. Top Court Won't Revive New Hampshire Ballot 'Selfie' Ban

docs.snippet: An 18-year-old man who authorities say shot a friend and then posed for a selfie with the dying teen has been convicted of a less serious charge....
docs.lead_paragraph: An 18-year-old man who authorities say shot a friend and then posed for a selfie with the dying teen has been convicted of a less serious charge.

headline.main: Teen Who Took Selfie After Fatally Shooting Friend Convicted
headline.print_headline: Teen Who Took Selfie After Fatally Shooting Friend Convicted
